Class WaitingListAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.example.ajilore.code.ui.events.list.WaitingListAdapter.VH>
com.example.ajilore.code.ui.events.list.WaitingListAdapter
public class WaitingListAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.example.ajilore.code.ui.events.list.WaitingListAdapter.VH>
RecyclerView.Adapter for displaying a waiting list of Entrants in a RecyclerView. Binds entrant data to rows and styles them according to their display status.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter

    androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter.StateRestorationPolicy

      Parameters:
